=How to create a link to the current page (whithout knowing its URL)?=

Void coservices are here for that:
<<code language="ocaml"|
a ~service:Eliom_service.void_coservice'
  [pcdata "Click to reload"] ();
>>

More information in
<<a_manual project="eliom" chapter="server-services" fragment="void"|Eliom's manual>>, and API documentation of
<<a_api project="eliom" subproject="server"|val Eliom_service.void_coservice'>>.
